item.title: Assad loyalists kill 14 in clash with Syria's new ruling forces
item.description: The clash took place with supporters of the ousted leader in Tartous, a stronghold of his Alawite sect.

item.title: Five Gaza journalists killed in Israeli strike
item.description: A Palestinian TV channel says they were in a marked media van, but Israel says it targeted an armed group.

item.title: Dozens survive Kazakhstan passenger plane crash
item.description: Kazakh authorities say almost half the people on board the aircraft survived the deadly incident.

item.title: S Korea MPs file motion to impeach acting president
item.description: The motion comes less than two weeks after parliament voted to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol.

item.title: Taiwan's ex-presidential candidate charged with corruption
item.description: Ko, once a rising star in Taiwan politics, is accused of accepting half a million dollars in bribes.
